According to the serial number, this one is for the CEO's office. You need it to get into that room, and every time you use that card, it leaves a record.Judge:Hmm...Phoenix:As you can see, there's no need to investigate the CEO of KB Security! We should be able to discover the truth simply by analyzing this key card's data!Godot:Bwaaaah...!Judge:Well, Mr. Godot?Godot:The name of the CEO of KB Security is Kane Bullard. I was unable to contact him directly, but... I got the key card data. ...Here.Judge:S-So what does it show!?Godot:Each key card has its own serial number and they leave detailed records of their use. According to this data... this card was used at 1 AM on the morning of the crime.Key Card updated in the Court Record.Judge:But that means... it can't be Mr. DeLite dressed as Mask☆DeMasque in this photo!Godot:Ha...! It looks like you're right. Two minutes isn't even enough time to brew a good cup o' Joe...Phoenix:So... So then...!Godot:Ron DeLite was clearly in the office of KB Security's CEO at the time of the crime. ...The prosecutor's office is ready to admit that fact. Therefore, it's impossible for the defendant to be Mask☆DeMasque.Maya:Good job! You did it, Nick!Judge:...That's enough! I came perilously close to besmirching the record of an innocent young man. Besmirching him with the title of "thief"! ...Phoenix:Wh-What's wrong, Your Honor?Judge:I'm ready to pass judgement... But before I do that, do you have any further objections?Phoenix:No, Your Honor!Godot:Hrpmh...!Ron:Unnnggh...Judge:...Very well. The court finds the defendant, Mr. Ron DeLite...Not GuiltyJudge:Court is now adjourned! (Changed from [This court is adjourned!] in the original release)October 13, 2:24 PMDistrict CourtDefendant Lobby No. 4Maya:Nick! You did it! You were right after all! Actually... I'm a little bit ashamed of myself.Desirée:Nicky boy!Phoenix:Oh! Ms. DeLite...!Desirée:I knew you could do it! I believed in you all along, Nicky boy! ...I don't know how I can ever repay you.Phoenix:Aww... Shucks... Thanks, Ms. DeLite. (I just know I'm blushing...)Pearl:Congratulations, Mr. Nick!Phoenix:Oh! P-Pearls...! (I've got a bad feeling about this...)Pearl:*gasp!* Wh-Who is this woman!Phoenix:Oh, she... She's nobody... She's just ahh...Pearl:You're blushing! How dare you do this in front of Mystic Maya! You should be ashamed of yourself!Phoenix:(Yeowch! She slapped me...)Maya:Umm, Pearly... This woman is Ms. Desirée DeLite. She's our client's wife.Pearl:*gasp!* Mr. Nick!Phoenix:Y-Yes!?Pearl:You're even worse than I thought! Going behind the back of your own client...!Phoenix:N-N-No! You've got it all wrong!Pearl:I'll never forgive you!Phoenix:(Owww... A double slap...)Maya:Well, anyway, All's well that ends well, right? We got the Sacred Urn back and the thief has been caught!Desirée:You're so right! And it's all thanks to Nicky boy here!Maya:But actually it was you, Ms. DeLite, that brought us our urn back! Thank you from the bottom of my heart!Desirée:Oh, please... You're embarrassing me!Phoenix:(If we won the case... ...then why does this guy still look so glum...?)Ron:Ugggh... But I am the thief... Actually, what's the point nowDesirée:...What is it, honey? I did my best for you, Ronnie!Ron:I-I know that and I appreciate it, Dessie... But the thing is...Godot:Come on... Give the kid some time. He's just got a little touch of the blues. You know about feeling blue, right, amigo?Phoenix:M-Mr. Godot! What are you doing here!?Godot:Oh come on! I just came here to say thanks to my newest buddy... ...You, Mr. Trite.Phoenix:(Maybe you should learn my name before you call me "buddy"...)Godot:Well, playtime is over.Phoenix:Huh...?Godot:Early this morning... the body of Kane Bullard was discovered.Maya:Kane Bullard...? Where have I heard that name before?Desirée:Isn't that... the name of the CEO of KB Security?Maya:Wait. B-Body...!? (Changed from [B-Body...?] in the original release)Godot:The estimated time of death was 1 AM on October 12th.Phoenix:1 AM on October 12th...? Y-You don't mean!?Godot:...That's right, amigo. At the same time that a cheap little urn was being stolen... ...the CEO of KB Security was being murdered.Phoenix:S-So then... What are you doing here?Godot:Oh come on. You've figured it out already, haven't you amigo? Or... Have you already forgotten about that piece of info I helped you out with today?Phoenix:("Helped me out"? What!?)Godot:On October 12th, at 1 o'clock in the morning... Ron DeLite was in the CEO's office... ...The scene of the murder. After getting that blackmail letter, he must have been imbrued with utter rage.Maya:Wh-What are you saying!? Imbrued with rage...?Godot:Come on! Don't tell me you didn't know! (Changed from [Come on! Don't tell me you didn't know it!] in the original release) Ron DeLite was once an employee of KB Security... He was a professional security guard.Phoenix:(An employee of KB Security!?)Godot:It looks like the alibi that saved him from being convicted as a thief... ...is going to be the noose that gets him hanged. Kind of an "anti-alibi".Maya:No way...Godot:He can't be the thief because he was at the murder scene when the murder occurred!Desirée:N-No! Th-That's a lie! It can't be true!Ron:Oh! Ohhhh! B-But I... I am a thief I tell you!Godot:Ron DeLite. You're going back to prison again. This time the charge is much more serious. This time you'll be tried for murder.Phoenix:Wh-What!? This can't... This is impossible!Godot:I'm looking forward to another exciting showdown, Mr. Trite!Phoenix:...!Godot:You and I aren't through with each other yet. Surely you won't back down from a challenge! You've never been a coward!Pearl:Mr. Nick! Is there something personal between you two...?Godot:I've returned from the depths of Hell to do battle with you. ...At least let me have some fun while I'm here!Phoenix:(This guy... Who the heck is he!? He may be quiet... But he's the most dangerous enemy I've ever faced...)Godot:Well then... Time to say goodbye to Mr. DeLite.Phoenix:...Maya:N-Nick...! How could this be happening?Phoenix:Right in front of our every eyes, our client has been arrested for murder. And the one who established his presence at the scene... was me.Desirée:EEEEEYYYAAAAHHH! R-RONNNIEEEEEEEE!Phoenix:(Arrested for murder on the very same day he's declared innocent of larceny... What the heck's going to happen next!?)To be continued.Presenting wrong evidence during testimonyPhoenix:Phoenix:Your Honor! What do you think about the witness's statement?Judge:Uh... I'm not sure I follow you.Phoenix:It clearly, er, contradicts the... um... I thought...Judge:You don't sound very sure, Mr. Wright. Objection overruled.Phoenix:(I don't think that won me any points with the judge...)Presenting wrong evidence during testimonyPhoenix:Phoenix:Your Honor! That statement contradicts this evidence!Judge:...? It does? I don't see anything contradictory...Phoenix:Huh? Really?Judge:Objection overruled. Try to think before you make accusations, Mr. Wright!Phoenix:(Whoops! That didn't go so well.)Presenting wrong evidence during testimonyPhoenix:Phoenix:This evidence clearly reveals the contradiction in that statement, Your Honor!Judge:How exactly are the evidence and the statement just now related?Phoenix:They aren't, are they...Judge:Not at all. Mr. Wright, please think the facts over before making accusations.Phoenix:(I don't think that won me any points with the judge...)Presenting wrong evidence during testimonyPhoenix:Phoenix:The witness's statement is clearly faulty, Your Honor!Judge:... I'm sorry, but I can see nothing faulty. Unfortunately, I will have to penalize you, Mr. Wright.Phoenix:(Ugh, I must be on the wrong track...?)Too many penaltiesJudge:That's enough! This court sees no reason to further prolong the trial. Nor is there any need for more time to decide the case against the defendant. This case is extremely clear. I see no room for mis-interpretation of the facts. This court finds the defendant, Ron DeLite...GuiltyJudge:The accused will surrender to the court immediately... ...to be held pending trial at a higher court within a month from today's date. That is all. This court is adjourned!

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: Me. What more can I say? This is my third year as a young (but skilled!) lawyer.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Head of planning, promotion, and security of the Treasures of Kurain Exhibit.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Mask☆DeMasque
characters.description1: A flashy thief who steals valuable works of art. Sends a calling card before a heist.

characters.name: Luke Atmey
characters.description1: An Ace Detective. Has great powers of deduction, yet rarely makes sense.
characters.description2: An Ace Detective. Has acknowledged that he is in fact Mask☆DeMasque.

characters.name: Ron DeLite
characters.description1: A young man who turned himself in as Mask☆DeMasque. A bit of a pitiful guy.
characters.description2: Claims he is Mask☆DeMasque. Used to work as a guard for KB Security.

characters.name: Desirée DeLite
characters.description1: Ron DeLite's wife. Seems to be a very friendly and out-going lady.
characters.description2: Ron DeLite's wife. Hates criminals and cowards more than anything.

characters.name: Larry Butz
characters.description1: My friend. I've known this trouble magnet ever since grade school.
characters.description2: My friend. Picked up Ron DeLite's wallet while working on the night of the crime.

characters.name: Godot
characters.description1: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.

characters.name: Kane Bullard
characters.description1: CEO of KB Security. His body was found inside his safe.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.

evidences.name: Treasure Exhibit Poster
evidences.description1: A poster for the Treasures of Kurain exhibit. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Ami Fey's Golden Statue
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Is holding the Shichishito.
evidences.description2: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Moved the night of the crime.
evidences.description3: Carried into the basement warehouse the day of the crime. Moved again that night.

evidences.name: Sacred Urn
evidences.obtained: Received from Maya Fey.  → Submitted as evidence by Desirée DeLite.
evidences.description1: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, it looks like a plain old pot.
evidences.description2: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, but has no monetary value.
evidences.description3: Found in the office of Luke Atmey. Has pink splotches all over it.
evidences.description4: Found in Atmey's Office. Covered in pink splotches, but it's the genuine article.
evidences.description5: Broken and repaired by Adrian 2 weeks ago, then replaced in its box. Kept out of sight.

evidences.name: DeMasque's Calling Card
evidences.description1: Sent before a heist, the emblem is top-secret. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Shichishito
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: A ceremonial sword held in the hand of Ami Fey's statue. Wasn't bent before the crime.
evidences.description2: DeMasque knocked Atmey out during the crime w/ a blow to the back of the head.

evidences.name: Camera Data
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: The warehouse camera went off at around 1 AM on the night of the crime.

evidences.name: Desirée's Letter
evidences.description1: Addressed to her husband Ron DeLite. Apparently contains something important.

evidences.name: Security Camera Photo
evidences.description1: Photo of storeroom entrance taken by the camera. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Blackmail Letter
evidences.description1: Written with a fountain pen. Found in Ron's room. Click here to read.
evidences.description2: Found in Ron DeLite's room. Written by Bullard. Click here to read.

evidences.name: Ron's Wallet
evidences.description1: Found by Larry at his part-time security job's company building (night of the crime).

evidences.name: Key Card → CEO Office Key Card
evidences.description1: Found inside Ron's wallet. Apparently used for the building of his part-time job.
evidences.description2: Found in Ron's wallet. Opens the KB Security CEO's office. Leaves a record when used.
evidences.description3: Found in Ron's wallet. Used on October 12th, the night of the crime, at 1 AM.

evidences.name: Publicity Photo
evidences.description1: A shot of Mask☆DeMasque striking a pose. Click here for details.

evidences.name: DeMasque's Broach
evidences.description1: Found in the shadow of Ami Fey's statue. Looks like it was torn off of some clothing.

evidences.name: Kane's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Time of death: 10/12 at 1 AM. Cause: Cerebral hemorrhaging from blunt trauma to the head.

evidences.name: Newspaper Clipping
evidences.description1: An article on Mask☆DeMasque's first heist. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: About first heist. Guard in photo is Ron DeLite. Click here for details.

evidences.name: CEO Office Buzzer
evidences.obtained: Found in the KB Security CEO's Office.
evidences.description1: Connected to the basement Security Guard Office. There are no fingerprints on it.

evidences.name: Kane's List
evidences.obtained: Found in the KB Security CEO's Office.
evidences.description1: Found on a table at the crime scene. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Buzzer Record
evidences.description1: The buzzer went off once at 1:02 AM on October 12 in the CEO's office.

evidences.name: Ron's Testimony
evidences.description1: From DeMasque's 2nd heist on, he was stealing as directed by blackmail letters.

evidences.name: Urn Box
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: A wooden box that had the Sacred Urn in it. Has pink paint stains on it.

evidences.name: Paint Marks
evidences.obtained: Obtained in Lordly Tailor's Basement Warehouse.
evidences.description1: Completely dry. The box of the Sacred Urn fits in the gap perfectly.
evidences.description2: When Adrian dropped the urn's box 2 weeks ago she also knocked over some paint.
